title: Ticket #2598: Allow job_queue.log to be in a different directory than SPOOL
description: Currently, the file job_queue.log must reside in the $(SPOOL) directory. The schedd frequently fsync's the job_queue.log, which can be very expensive. We'd like to put the job_queue.log on an SSD, but can't fit rest of spool there. So, we'd like a new knob to control just where the job-queue.log goes.
